artist: Edward Ruscha; Edward A. Foster; Published by Minneapolis Institute of Art; Co-designed by Edward Ruscha; Co-designed by Edward A. Foster; Printed by Kolorpress, Inc., Minneapolis
creditline: Gift of Sandra and Peter Butler
description: Hardcover exhibition catalogue; green paper over cardboard; printed on cover and spine with palm tree images from "A Few Palm Trees." 436 pp. (261 with text or images; 175 blank pp.)
provenance: Pub. by Minneapolis Institute of Arts, 1972; Sandra and Peter Butler, Minneapolis; thier gift to MIA, 1995.
title: Edward Ruscha (ED-WERD REW-SHAY) Young Artist
